173.title: Archie Comics
notes:
American comics publisher. Listed here together are publisher names Archie Comic Publications, Archie Comics, Archie Enterprises, and Archie Music Corp., and comics with the designations An Archie Magazine, or Archie Series. See also related publishers
  • Close-Up, Inc.
  • Red Circle Comics
    and the listing of
  • Archie stories
